column4: Any way to get gnome-terminal to send F1 keypresses to the session instead of bringing up the terminal help?
it does do that for sme apps i run in the terminal. ie: for 'mc' f1 does do f1 in mc.
gnome-terminal has settings where you can disable the F* shortcuts
sounds like it may be the 'dma' settings.. but ive not seen those issues in years.. not even sure how to set/check them any more.
